definition: to go home (to one's native country)/to return from abroad
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo

sentences.english: However, since her return, Chapman has become something of a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 但是，自查普曼歸國後，她幾乎已是民族英雄。

sentences.english: The legionaries, on their victorious return, refused any longer to obey the consuls.
sentences.chinese: 軍團士兵在凱旋歸國時，不肯服從執政官的命令。

sentences.english: Stars into the studies abroad, and Ming Li reunion, the two became lovers.
sentences.chinese: 星進學成歸國，與明莉重逢，兩人成了戀人。

sentences.english: Hong Wang. Male. A homecoming Overseas Chinese (from Japan).
During the period of Nanjing government, the primary decision-making power is mainly predominated by the returned students from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 南京政府時期，留日歸國學生掌握了主要權力。

sentences.english: North Korean football players sent to coal mine after World Cup loss?
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮隊員發配煤礦，敗軍之將的歸國命運？

sentences.english: There's been another homecoming this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月還有一位著名人物歸國。

sentences.english: Federations of returned overseas Chinese shall give them support and help.
sentences.chinese: 歸國華僑聯合會應當給予支持和幫助。

sentences.english: The construction industry has been badly hurt by nationalisation.
sentences.chinese: 營建業已經在收歸國有的過程受傷慘重。

sentences.english: She will return to his country by way of Bangkok.
I just graduated from concordia university in canada , and my major is finance.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名剛剛從加拿大學成歸國的畢業生。

sentences.english: TEDA Watson Bio-tech Park is a specialized incubator established by overseas scholars.
sentences.chinese: 泰達華生生物園是由歸國留學生創建的專業孵化器。

sentences.english: The British government nationalized the railways in1948.
sentences.chinese: 英國政府在一九四八年把鐵路收歸國有。

sentences.english: This policy doesn't specify what kind of returnee qualifies as "high-level".
sentences.chinese: 這項政策並沒有清楚表明什麼是高水平的歸國人員。

definition: to toss about in bed/from person to person/indirectly/to wander
